pullRequest.body: In this PR we rename `DiscreteValuationRing` to `IsDiscreteValuationRing`, since the latter is `Prop`-valued.

nodes.body:
### PR summary [e2db9c78ac](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/19947/commits/e2db9c78ac004f32ca24b745f595b81a9073373a)

#### Import changes for modified files

No significant changes to the import graph


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ IsDiscreteValuationRing`
`+ IsDiscreteValuationRing.TFAE`
`+ IsLocalization.AtPrime.isDiscreteValuationRing_of_dedekind_domain`
`+ instance (R : Type*) [CommRing R] [IsDomain R] [IsDiscreteValuationRing R] :`
`+ instance (priority := 100) of_isDiscreteValuationRing : ValuationRing A := inferInstance`
`+ instance : IsDiscreteValuationRing k⟦X⟧`
`+ instance : IsDiscreteValuationRing ℤ_[p]`
`+ isDiscreteValuationRing`
`- DiscreteValuationRing`
`- DiscreteValuationRing.TFAE`
`- IsLocalization.AtPrime.discreteValuationRing_of_dedekind_domain`
`- discreteValuationRing`
`- instance (R : Type*) [CommRing R] [IsDomain R] [DiscreteValuationRing R] :`
`- instance (priority := 100) of_discreteValuationRing : ValuationRing A := inferInstance`
`- instance : DiscreteValuationRing k⟦X⟧`
`- instance : DiscreteValuationRing ℤ_[p]`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>

The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

---

<details><summary>No changes to technical debt.</summary>

You can run this locally as
```
./scripts/technical-debt-metrics.sh pr_summary
```
* The `relative` value is the weighted *sum* of the differences with weight given by the *inverse* of the current value of the statistic.
* The `absolute` value is the `relative` value divided by the total sum of the inverses of the current values (i.e. the weighted *average* of the differences).
</details>

> I'm not an expert in the naming convention so think twice before accepting my suggestions!

Yeah, they also often confuse me. But I have double-checked your suggestions with the community instructions and I think they were all correct. Thanks!

Pull request successfully merged into master.

  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/12372245228/job/34530019627)
I'm not an expert in the naming convention so think twice before accepting my suggestions!
I'm not an expert in the naming convention so think twice before accepting my suggestions!

```suggestion
* `WittVector.isDiscreteValuationRing`: `𝕎 k` is a discrete valuation ring if `k` is a perfect field
```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - faet(RingTheory/DiscreteValuationRing/Basic): rename `DiscreteValuationRing` to `IsDiscreteValuationRing`.
